title: Curry and Rice

description: A plate of orange-brown curry with vegetables or meat, served with a mound of white rice. May represent kare-raisu, or Japanese curry, though commonly associated with India and other Asian cuisines.
apple_vendor_description: The curry rice emoji on Apple devices presents a steaming bowl of golden curry, artfully poured over fluffy white rice. Apple's signature realistic lighting and soft gradients give the dish a mouthwatering texture, with subtle shadows adding depth and a sense of deliciousness. This emoji is perfect for conveying a craving for comfort food, sharing a meal experience, or celebrating culinary delights, bringing a warm and inviting visual to your digital conversations.
